definition: The German word "Alltag" refers to the routine or everyday life of an individual. It encompasses the ordinary activities, tasks, and experiences that one encounters on a regular basis. This term is commonly used to describe the mundane aspects of life, such as work, household chores, commuting, and other daily routines.

examples.german: Der Alltag kann manchmal stressig sein.
examples.english: Everyday life can be stressful sometimes.

examples.german: Ich habe einen vollen Terminkalender und wenig Zeit für meinen Alltag.
examples.english: I have a busy schedule and little time for my daily life.

examples.german: Im Alltag müssen wir viele Entscheidungen treffen.
examples.english: In everyday life, we have to make many decisions.

examples.german: Der Alltag besteht aus kleinen Aufgaben und Routinen.
examples.english: Daily life consists of small tasks and routines.

examples.german: Ich versuche, meinen Alltag so gut wie möglich zu organisieren.
examples.english: I try to organize my daily life as best as possible.
